title: Illaoi's theme
body: Hey I was wondering if someone composed illaoi theme and if so could you send me a score for the cello and violin thanks

replies.body:
Hey pearlesent,

Unfortunately we don't have a good way of sharing sheet music with our players just yet :( People have been asking a lot, I'll do my best to move things forward. 

Illaoi is a bit particular, as there are three violas and three celli playing the music. All six parts are different from each other. Hopefully you get a chance to play it sooner than later!

Cheers,
Ed the Conqueror
